sqlMap.select: SELECT SEQ , BIZ_CODE , BIZ_ITEM , TARGET_RESULT , TARGET_TIME , REAL_TIME , PROG_RATE , PLAN_DO , GAB_ANAL , SCHEDULE_DT , REG_DT , (SELECT NAME FROM PDS_USER WHERE id=REG_USER ) REG_USER , UPDATE_DT , UPDATE_USER FROM PDS_CONTENT WHERE SEQ=#seq#
sqlMap.insert: MERGE INTO PDS_CONTENT USING DUAL ON (seq = #SEQ#) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET BIZ_CODE = UPPER(#BIZ_CODE#) ,BIZ_ITEM = #BIZ_ITEM# ,TARGET_RESULT = #TARGET_RESULT# ,TARGET_TIME = #TARGET_TIME# ,REAL_TIME = #REAL_TIME# ,PROG_RATE = #PROG_RATE# ,PLAN_DO = #PLAN_DO# ,GAB_ANAL = #GAB_ANAL# ,SCHEDULE_DT = #SCHEDULE_DT# ,UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE ,UPDATE_USER = #UPDATE_USER# WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (SEQ ,BIZ_CODE ,BIZ_ITEM ,TARGET_RESULT ,TARGET_TIME ,REAL_TIME ,PROG_RATE ,PLAN_DO ,GAB_ANAL ,SCHEDULE_DT ,REG_DT ,REG_USER ,UPDATE_DT ,UPDATE_USER) VALUES (SEQ_PDS_CONTENT.NEXTVAL ,UPPER(#BIZ_CODE#) ,#BIZ_ITEM# ,#TARGET_RESULT# ,#TARGET_TIME# ,#REAL_TIME# ,#PROG_RATE# ,#PLAN_DO# ,#GAB_ANAL# ,#SCHEDULE_DT# ,SYSDATE ,#UPDATE_USER# ,SYSDATE ,#UPDATE_USER#)
